text: Ramji Lal (25 March 1930 - 15 January 2021) was an Indian politician. He was in the Rajya Sabha as a member of the Indian National Congress from 1992 to 1993 and 1994 to 2000. Lal died on 15 January 2021 at the age of 90.Bhajan aide Ramji Lal dead ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Politicians from Haryana Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Ramji Lal
